overview: Documentary that addresses the arrival of slams poetry in Brazil, changes in performance of poetry. Born in the 80s in Chicago, slams have spread all over the world as spaces dedicated to meeting, people of all ages, professions and social classes, where a game of competition is just a pretext to hear and speak poetry in the exercise of free expression , stimulating listening, writing, reading and self-representation.
title: SLAM: Voz de Levante
